        public CardPile()

    • Method Detail

      • shuffle

        public void shuffle()
        Shuffles the pile of cards. Implements the Fisher-Yates shuffle.

      • removeTop

        public Card removeTop()
        Remove top card from pile.
        Returns:
        A Card object copy of Card that was first in the pile

      • returnToBottom

        public void returnToBottom(Card card)
        Return a card to bottom of pile.
        Parameters:
        card - A Card object to be placed at the current last index of the pile

      • returnToTop

        public void returnToTop(Card card)
        Return a card to top of pile.
        Parameters:
        card - A Card object to be placed at the current first index of the pile

      • peekTopCard

        public Card peekTopCard()
        Return a copy of card at top of pile without altering the pile.
        Parameters:
        card - A Card object copy of Card that was first in the pile

      • getSize

        public int getSize()
        Get number of cards in pile.
        Returns:
        An integer for the number of cards currently in pile.
